summary:
A simple Conjuration Spell that summons a Spriggan for 130 seconds. Intended for Nature / Druid characters, who want something different to call into battle.

Level: Novice
Magicka Cost: 74
Value: 400
descriptionHtml:
A simple Conjuration Spell that summons a Spriggan for 60 seconds. Intended for Nature / Druid characters, who want something different to call into battle.

Level: Novice
Magicka Cost: 31
Value: 200

The Spell can be purchased from the various merchants that can be found around Skyrim, such as General stores and Mages. Enjoy!
author: Sharn
